short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the depressing trending news on your Facebook with uplifting stories!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I noticed that my Facebook trending news bar was filled with the most depressing stories ever. So I made a quick hacky Chrome extension to replace that depressing news bar with the top stories of the day from my favorite subreddit www.reddit.com/r/UpliftingNews. 

Every day you get popular uplifting news stories and at the very least it protects your eyeballs from reading about irrelevant murders that happened hundreds of miles away!
